description: Ash Ketchum encountered some Team Yell grunts while on route to his match against Marie for their Hyper Class Battle. However, in an attempt at making Marnie win a walkover victory, Team Yell feeds him misinformation regarding the venue of the match and sends him to Spiketown, where he encounters Marie`s older brother and Spike Town`s Gym Leader, Piers. Piers drives Ash Ketchum to the real venue on his motorcycle and Marnie got mad at them for making Ash get the wrong venue.
name: Yell-dan`in
